text: aur isee prakaar hamane apane aadesh se ek rooh (quraan) kee prakaashana tumhaaree or kee hai. tum nahin jaanate the ki kitaab kya hotee hai aur na eemaan ko (jaanate the), kintu hamane is (prakaashana) ko ek prakaash banaaya, jisake dvaara ham apane bandon mein se jise chaahate hai maarg dikhaate hai. nishchay hee tum ek seedhe maarg kee or pathapradarshan kar rahe ho
